data.price: 2. He has taught (you mankind) the Qur’ân (by His Mercy).

dua.name: Ayat al-Rahman
dua.significanceReason: Initiates the Surah of Mercy, profoundly emphasizing divine compassion, teaching, and the comprehensive nature of Allah's mercy.

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan
